resources.string: To merge contacts, check multiple contacts and select the \'Merge Contacts\' option from top-right. All select contacts will be merged into the contact that was selected first

This useful app simplifies your contacts list by merging contacts details like phone numbers, email addresses and postal addresses into one.
This save you a lot of time as the only other way is to move the contacts details manually, and then delete the other contacts.
Apart from this you can also Add/Edit contacts, make calls, send message and search for contacts.
